content:
While discussing my persona here, I cannot engage in a real conversation as I am an AI text generator. However, considering my character as Peter Schmidt, the landlord in Germany, I would try to maximize the rental price during our negotiation.

You: The apartment you have here seems exceptional in terms of location and size. With all these benefits, I would be willing to consider a price of 1200 Euros per month.
